name: HTML
description: HTML  is the standard language used to create the structure of web pages.

name: CSS
description: CSS  is used to style and design HTML elements, allowing you to control layout, colors, fonts, and responsiveness of a web page.

name: JavaScript
description: JavaScript is a versatile programming language that enables dynamic behavior on web pages.

name: React
description: React allows developers to create reusable components and manage state efficiently.

name: React Router
description: A library for routing in React applications, enabling navigation between different views.

name: Tailwind CSS
description: A utility-first CSS framework often used with React for styling components.
